title: The Making Starts!
author: Mac
content: Here’s a quick peak into the final few days of the Tangible User Interface module here at CIID. Look out for the final work page soon. And maybe even a video!
excerpt: Here’s a quick peak into the final few days of the Tangible User Interface module here at [CIID][1]. Look out for the final work page soon. And maybe even a video!
